project_plan.name: Temperature Conversion CLI Tool in Python
project_plan.description: Implement a command-line tool to convert temperatures between Celsius, Fahrenheit, and Kelvin.

task.name: Implement temperature conversion functionality (Celsius, Fahrenheit, Kelvin)
Implement user input handling for temperature and desired output unit
Implement error handling for invalid inputs (non-numeric values, out-of-range values)
Write tests for conversion functions (Celsius to Fahrenheit, Fahrenheit to Celsius, etc.)
Execute tests on temperature conversion functionality to ensure accuracy and robustness
